events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the Software Engineer position. The resume highlights strong experience in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
The candidate has been categorized under the Engineering cluster due to keywords such as 'software', 'engineer', and 'cloud' found in the application.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to manage this candidate's recruitment process and will proceed with the initial screening shortly.
The initial phone screening was completed successfully; the candidate demonstrated good knowledge in software architecture and problem-solving.
The candidate responded promptly to the screening feedback and expressed enthusiasm about the opportunity to proceed to technical interviews.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate next week to assess coding skills and system design capabilities.
